Intro : This area for UE4

####################
#*/Build
*/Binaries
*/DerivedDataCache
*/Intermediate
*/Saved

############
#Asset Files#
###########
*/Content/AssetFolderName1
*/Content/AssetFolderName2
*/Content/AssetFolderName3

##################
#VS Generated Files#
#################
*/.vs
